rename.from: Enabling schemaCache on a database that is also the storage for Cache causes a loop
rename.to: Enabling queryCache on a database that is also the storage for Cache causes a loop

issue.title: "Maximum function nesting level of" using  yii\caching\DbDependency and yii\data\ActiveDataProvider

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

body: It makes sure that an insert due to a cache update doesn't update the queryCache for that insert-query.

issue.title: Query causes infinite loop within framework

labels.name: status:to be verified
labels.description: Needs to be reproduced and validated.

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
### What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. for component "db" set `'enableQueryCache' => true`
2. `SomeModelActiveRecord::find()->where(['>', 'int_field', time()])->min('int_field')`. Important condition: this query must return `null`

### What is the expected result?
receive `null`

### What do you get instead?
Query will be repeated many times before memory will be exhausted. If `enableQueryCache` set to `false`, bug not reproduced

### Additional info

| Q                | A
| ---------------- | ---
| Yii version      | 2.0.10
| PHP version      | 5.6.12, 7.0.14
| Operating system | windows & debian
